main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in Thornwood, NY on April 25, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for 20 seconds and was described as bright and silent,The witness noted that the object traveled at a very high altitude and speed,The witness reported that the object changed direction from north to south,Several documents indicate the sighting was reported to local authorities,In the correspondence, the witness requested additional information on what was observed.
sighted object: a bright, silent object in the sky
witness description: The witness was a civilian who observed the object while walking their dog.
